root.name: Meitantei Conan: 3-Jin no Meitantei
root.description: OverviewThe player takes on the role of the shrunk-ed young detective Conan Edogawa to solve two new cases in this release.Unlike the previous game Detective Conan which uses first and third person perspectives, this game only feature first person perspective.The game use full animated scenes and sound, with the original actors from the anime as voice actors aswell.GameplayInvestigating a crime sceneThe game pretty much uses the same formula as in the previous game Detective Conan, which is talking to other characters and gathering information from suspects. As well as finding clues all around the scenes using a point and click style.
